data.name: Failling Capsule
data.detailed_description:
About This Game

"Use your controls and your head to escape!"
You use your head and controls to escape.

'Failling Capsule' is a puzzle game that requires mouse control.
Sometimes you have to go through the steps with your own control, and sometimes you have to go through the steps with your head.
As you move on to the next level, new features may emerge, or they may become more difficult.
It consists of 20 levels in easy mode, 10 levels in normal mode, and 1 level in hard mode.

Now test your limits.

Disclaimer

The developer will not compensate if the mouse or keyboard is damaged while playing the game.

Control

Use the right mouse button to move.
Press the spacebar to use the item.

Requirements

'Failling Capsule' can work on any Windows computer with working 3D graphics is sufficient.

data.short_description: This game is a puzzle game that requires mouse control.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: Intel pentium g4560
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 620 Intel® UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel pentium g4560
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 620 Intel® UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
